Source: http://www.w3schools.com/xml/note.xml

```{xml}

<note>
  <to>Tove</to>
  <from>Jani</from>
  <heading>Reminder</heading>
  <body>Don't forget me this weekend!</body>
</note>

```

Source: http://www.w3schools.com/json/

```{json}
    {"firstName":"Anna", "lastName":"Smith"},
    {"firstName":"Peter", "lastName":"Jones"}
]}

```
